alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Dickenson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Dickenson, Buchanan and southern McDowell Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 459 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near War to near Davenport. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grundy, Haysi, Davenport, War, Clinchco, Bradshaw, Stacy, Vansant, Jolo, Oakwood, and Cucumber. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southwestern Virginia...and southern West Virginia.
